flawed_nl_solution:
He is 3 inches too short this year because 54 - 48 = <<54-48=3>>3
He will naturally grow 4 inches taller because 12 x (1/3) = <<12*(1/3)=4>>4
He needs to grow -1 inches from hanging because 3 - 4 = <<3-4=-1>>-1
He needs to hang for -12 hours because -1 / (1/12) = <<-1/(1/12)=-12>>-12
He needs to hang for -1 hours a month because -12 / 12 = <<-12/12=-1>>-1
#### -1

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 6, not 3. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
